comments:
Create an EJB project,FooEJB.
Open the deployment descriptor in the xml editor and remove the displayname 

display-name>FooEJB</>

Save the file and an exception is thrown in the console. Also the error 
message shows a warning there.

We need a better reporting mechanism here to report the exceptions that are
getting thrown to the console. The xml becomes invalid when the display name tag
is removed the code is doing the right thing bt what need is a better reporting
mechanism rather than throwing a bunch of stack traces

traces.message: The element type "display-name"  mu st be terminated by the matching end-tag "</display-name>".
